opqry:info.title: Glottalization
opqry:info.opqry:message:
# Glottalization
Generate an inventory of `{-glottal}` ↔ `{glottal}` alignments found in the selected sessions.
## Output
- *Session*
Session name
- *IPA Target*
IPA Target phone
- *IPA Actual*
IPA Actual phone
- *Total*
Number of occurrences in the session.
## Example:
Session|IPA Target|IPA Actual|Total :---:|:---:|:---:|:---: Catootje.1_10_10|f|h|1 Catootje.1_10_10|v|h|9 Catootje.1_10_10|v|ɦ|1 Catootje.1_10_10|s|ʔ|1 Catootje.1_10_10|s|h|1 Catootje.1_10_10|s|ɦ|1
